meaning_str.bing:
n. 文本；教科书；文档；剧本
v. （用手机给某人）发短信
网络. 文字；课文；正文

文本；（书籍或杂志的）正文；本文（并非附注、图片等）；文档；文章；原文；课本；教科书；必读书本；剧本；文稿；演讲稿；打字稿；《圣经》经文；文献资料
发送短信；发信息；用短信交流；给（某人）发短信

1.en: Event that allows you to perform a custom set of instructions every time the value of the text box changes between posts to the server.
1.cn: 事件，使您可以在每次文本框的值在向服务器的各次发送过程之间更改时执行自定义指令集。

2.en: And yet some conservatives have turned it into a profane text, one that proves Mr Obama's unfitness for the great office he holds.
2.cn: 但一些保守者把它当做亵渎神圣的话，证明了奥巴马不能胜任其肩负的巨大职责。

3.en: "British history has been a history of invasion. " Please illustrate this point with the examples from the text.
3.cn: “英国历史上一直是侵略历史的”请说明这点与例子，从文本。

0.en: John? Did you text me a new number earlier?
0.cn: 约翰？你是不是发了个新号码给我？

1.en: In person? What are we, 30? Send her a text.
1.cn: 当面吗？我们30岁了吗？给她发短信啊。

2.en: Maybe it's your fingernails. It's easy. Look. I'll text Mavis.
2.cn: 也许是因为你的指甲，很简单，看，我给梅菲斯发短信。

3.en: You invited her. You sent her a text. Or technically, I sent her a text, but she's not to know.
3.cn: 你请她来的。你给她发了条短信。或者严格地说，是我给她发了条短信，但她不知道。

4.en: I don't know, I just got a text. Come on, hurry. Okay.
4.cn: 不知道，我只是收到短信而已，快点，快走。好吧。

5.en: And then while I'm talking to Penny, I get a text from Bernadette.
5.cn: 我正和佩妮说着呢，伯纳黛特又发来短信。

6.en: You know those girls text me every detail of their lives as it happens.
6.cn: 要知道她们都会把生活中的每件事都发短信告诉我。

7.en: I got your text. Han does look like those minion things in Despicable Me!
7.cn: 我收到你短信了，Han的确长得像"神偷奶爸"里面的小黄人。

8.en: Hi. Hey. Look, I'm sorry I didn't text you back. I just needed some time to think.
8.cn: 抱歉，没回你短信，我只是需要点时间想想。

9.en: Okay, I'm going to play it cool. Tell her, "Maybe. Whatever, babe." He'll text you.
9.cn: 好吧，我决定扮酷。跟她说“再说吧，到时候再看，宝贝儿。”他会发短信给你的。

10.en: All right, just give her some space, all right? Don't call, don't text, don't e-mail.
10.cn: 给她一点空间就行了？别打电话，别发短信，别发邮件。

11.en: No! Did you text or e-mail? No, I didn't. I... Yes? I left myself a voice mail reminder.
11.cn: 没有。你有没有发短信，或电子邮件？不，我没有，我。怎么？我留了条语音邮件提醒自己。

12.en: Did you get my text? Of course. Yes, I did. So then you know I told Dan I'm not pregnant.
12.cn: 你收到我的短信了吗？当然。 那你也知道，我和丹说了我没怀孕。

13.en: Dad? What's happening? What was that text? Are you having one of your jokes? Who are you?
13.cn: 爸爸？怎么回事？那条短信是怎么回事？又是你的玩笑吗？你是谁？

14.en: And you don't think I can achieve the required intimacy via text messaging? Probably not.
14.cn: 你觉得通过短信息我无法达到必要的亲密吗？应该不能。

15.en: Hey. I just got your text. Everything okay? Yeah, there's just something I need to ask you.
15.cn: 我刚收到你的短信。没出什么事吧？没事，只是有一件事想问你。

16.en: Well, I have a text sent from you at 12 P.M. That's less than 20 seconds before the accident.
16.cn: 但我这有条你晚上12点发出的短信，离事故发生的时间不到20秒。

17.en: My users think I have sent every text and personal email over to the United States Government.
17.cn: 我的用户以为我把每条短信和私人邮件都发送给了美国政府。

18.en: You know why you're still alive? You want the names? They're in the phone. The last text, code 7741.
18.cn: 你知道你为什么现在还活着么？你想要名单？在我手机里。最后一条短信，密码7741。

19.en: Anonymous? I got sent an envelope with a phone inside, and then I started getting the text messages.
19.cn: 匿名？有人给我寄了一个装有手机的包裹，然后我就开始收到这些短信
